Two bodies of different mass m1 and m2 are dropped from heights of h1 and h2 respectively,neglecting the effect of friction the ratio of times taken to drop them from the given heights is,
In an oscillating mass-spring system, the velocity of the mass is greatest when the mass is,

answers.b: at the point of maximum displacement
answers.c: at the point where acceleration is greatest.
answers.d: halfway between the equilibrium point and maximum displacement

questions.question: An object attached to an ideal spring executes simple harmonic motion. If you want to double its total energy, you could

answers.a: double the force constant (spring constant) of the spring
answers.c: double both the amplitude and force constant (spring constant).
